title: Mass. man aboard Gaza aid flotilla arrested by Israeli forces after boats are intercepted, activists say
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: World News The Sheffield resident and his brother have been sailing on the Global Sumud Flotilla, which set out to supply Gazans with humanitarian aid.
A Mass.
man was taken into custody by Israeli forces after several boats in the Global Sumud Flotilla were intercepted.

title: Readers: Should foster parents’ personal views affect their ability to foster?
author: Frances Klemm
bullets: Tell Us A new Massachusetts rule requires foster parents to affirm a child’s sexual orientation and gender identity — and it’s drawing scrutiny from the Trump administration.

title: Ex-Market Basket CEO Arthur T. Demoulas demands his job back in new court filing
